title: Breitbart News Daily: Elite Globalism vs. Populist Nationalism
title_page: Breitbart News Daily: Elite Globalism vs. Populist Nationalism | Breitbart
text:
On the Monday edition of Breitbart News Daily, broadcast live on SiriusXM Patriot Channel 125 from 6AM to 9AM EST, Breitbart Executive Chairman Stephen K. Bannon will continue to break down the aftermath of the Brexit vote and what it means for populist/nationalist movement in the November election.
He’ll be joined by Breitbart London editor Raheem Kassam and Breitbart Editor in Chief Alex Marlow.
Special guests include Paul Nehlen, the Wisconsin businessman and Congressional candidate challenging Speak Paul Ryan, who will discuss the Brexit vote and TPP.
Breitbart’s Legal Editor Ken Klukowski will discuss the latest Supreme Court rulings.
Live from London, Rome, and Jerusalem, Breitbart correspondents will provide updates on the latest international news.
Breitbart News Daily is the first live, conservative radio enterprise to air seven days a week. SiriusXM Vice President for news and talk Dave Gorab called the show “the conservative news show of record.”
Follow Breitbart News on Twitter for live updates during the show. Listeners may call into the show at: 866-957-2874.
